metadata.name: Potential Provisioning Registry Key Abuse For Binary Proxy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential abuse of the provisioning registry key for indirect command execution through "Provlaunch.exe".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('software\\microsoft\\provisioning\\commands\\')))

output.summary: Detects potential abuse of the provisioning registry key for indirect command execution through "Provlaunch.exe".
